name: AttractRepel
description:
Control two magnets to reach the end of the level. GMTK2021.

Game Engine: Unity (Solo)
3rd Party Assets - freesound.org
BGM - ShadyDave - Anticipation - NonCommercial License
Repel SFX - Qubodup - Swipe Woosh

A/D - Controls North Magnet
J/K - Controls South Magnet
Space - Repel
F - Zoom Out
R - Restart
Escape - Quit
